description: Foxxy's evening begins with a hot bath in a private five star resort. After soaking, she lounges in the parlor in her silk robe, orders a glass of expensive wine and waits for the innocent server she has been eying to bring it to her. He's so innocent at only 20, Foxxy can't resist seducing him using his shyness to her advantage as he reluctantly agrees to put cock in his mouth for the first time.
title: Foxxy seduces the help
